name: Nothing
desc: Literally nothing. You should not be able to see this text in the final game.

name: Small Health Potion
desc: Your basic run-of-the-mill health restoration mixture. Heals 25% of your max HP. Subsequent uses in a short time will significantly reduce effectiveness.

name: Health Potion
desc: Your basic run-of-the-mill health restoration mixture. Heals 50% of your max HP. Subsequent uses in a short time will significantly reduce effectiveness.

name: Large Health Potion
desc: Your basic run-of-the-mill health restoration mixture. Heals 75% of your max HP. Subsequent uses in a short time will significantly reduce effectiveness.
